verbose_text: Previous studies have shown that dexmedetomidine could reduce the calculated effect-site EC 50 of propofol in a dose dependent manner [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR]; however, it is not known if there is any gender disparity on the calculated effect-site EC 50 of propofol during coadministration of different concentrations of dexmedetomidine.
evidence: dexmedetomidine could reduce the calculated effect-site EC 50  of propofol
